headline: UnitedHealth Faces Probes And CEO Shift As Valuation Gap Widens
summary: UnitedHealth Group (NYSE:UNH) is working through a difficult period marked by CEO turnover, federal probes into its Medicare billing practices, and fresh regulatory proposals affecting Medicare Advantage. To stabilize operations and address government concerns, the company has reinstated its longtime CEO and initiated independent reviews of internal processes. A proposed flat Medicare Advantage payment rate is drawing attention because of its potential to affect future profitability and plan...
